vendor_project.title: IOE Core Development Proposal (1of6)
vendor_project.contract_description: The Supplier will provide comprehensive engineering, maintenance, and development services to enhance and secure the Cardano protocol and its core infrastructure. The services are focused on delivering the community-endorsed technical roadmap and maintaining network stability. Projects included within this smart contract instance: Automatic Formal Verification, Property Based Testing Tool, Static Analyzer & Leios
